response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像～呪縛解放～
response.overview: The definitive collection of terrifying images! Over 80 titles in the series! This documentary horror film series is a milestone in the field of horror filmmaking, with over 90 titles in all, and has been collabolated with various genres such as TV personalities, magazines, and news sites! The contents included in this collection are truly a collection of horrifying images that can be described as a curse unleashed.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video: Curse Liberation
